name: Cosmonaut - Prototype
description:
This game was created for the 1st libGDX Jam.
This is a prototype that was made in exactly 1 month.
Get the FULL GAME

Story

After you spaceship was hit by meteoroids while crossing the asteroid belt, the spaceship is wrecked. No more oxygen and no more artificial gravity. In order to survive, Major Tom needs to reach the safety capsule, with the help of his jetpack equipped spacesuit.

Gameplay

For each level, you have limited oxygen and limited jetpack fuel. Oxygen decreases with time, fuel decreases each time you use the jetpack. Use your jetpack wisely !

Controls

  • A : Rotate counter-clockwise
  • D : Rotate clockwise
  • W : Use the jetpack
  • O : Camera zoom-out
  • P : Camera zoom-in
  • Esc : Pause
